testCase.requirementText: File size mets/dmdSec/mdRef/@SIZE The creation date and time of the referenced file. 1..1 MUST
testCase.description: File creation date - dmdSec/mdRef/@created - The date the linked file was created. It has cardinality '1..1' and level 'MUST' in CSIP. It is optional according to its XML Schema. Rule needed for the existence of the attribute CREATED for element dmdSec/mdRef. ERROR if it does not exists. There is no need for a check for blank or NULL values in the attribute since the mets schema will only tolerate dateTime values

rule.description: If dmdSec/mdRef-element is present there MUST be at CREATED-attribute

error.message: mets/dmdSec/mdRef/@CREATED does not exist in METS.xml. @CREATED is a mandatory attribute according to CSIP.

package.name: IP_18000_CSIP28_1
